hero.maindesc: Hi, I'm Alexey Cherman. A passionate Frontend Developer based in Taganrog, Russia.

about.abouttitle: A dedicated Front-end Developer based in Taganrog, Russia
about.aboutdesc: As a Front-End developer, I have some arsenal of skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React and Mui. I excel at developing and maintaining responsive websites that provide a smooth user experience. My experience is in creating dynamic, attractive interfaces by writing clean and optimized code and using advanced development tools and techniques. I am also a team player who excels at collaborating with cross-functional teams to create outstanding web applications.

projects.projectstitle: Each project is a unique piece of development

project1.title: CoinDom
project1.desc: Coindom is a crypto app that allows users to search for information about various cryptocurrencies in real-time.

contact.contacttitle: Don't be shy! Hit me up!
